00026 #ifndef _FILE5_UTIL_H_
00027 #define _FILE5_UTIL_H_
00028

00030 #include "file5/File5_types.h"
00031 //
00032 #include "file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h"
00033 //
00034 #include <vector>
00035 
00036 // We are dead.
00037 #define FILE5_ABORT(xmsg) \
00038   { \
00039     Err::errAbort("File5: " __FILE__ ":"+ToStr(__LINE__)+" "+ToStr(xmsg)); \
00040   }
00041 // xcond must be true or we are dead.
00042 #define FILE5_ASSERT(xcond) \
00043   { \
00044     if (!(xcond)) { \
00045       FILE5_ABORT(#xcond); \
00046     } \
00047   }
00048 // the return value must be "0" or we are dead.
00049 #define FILE5_CHECKRV(xrv,xmsg) \
00050   { \
00051   int tmp_xrv=xrv; \
00052   if (tmp_xrv!=0) { \
00053     FILE5_ABORT("rv="+ToStr(tmp_xrv)+": "+xmsg); \
00054   } \
00055 }
00056 // the ID must be positive.
00057 #define FILE5_CHECKID(xid,xmsg) \
00058 { \
00059   int tmp_xid=xid; \
00060   if (tmp_xid<0) { \
00061     FILE5_ABORT("id="+ToStr(tmp_xid)+": "+xmsg);  \
00062   } \
00063 }
00064 
00065 //
00066 #define FILE5_DIM1(NAME,D0) \
00067   hsize_t NAME[1]; \
00068   NAME[0]=D0;
00069 
00070 #define FILE5_DIM2(NAME,D0,D1) \
00071   hsize_t NAME[2]; \
00072   NAME[0]=D0; \
00073   NAME[1]=D1;
00074 
00075 #define FILE5_DIM3(NAME,D0,D1,D2) \
00076   hsize_t NAME[3]; \
00077   NAME[0]=D0; \
00078   NAME[1]=D1; \
00079   NAME[2]=D2;
00080 
00081 //
